@ECHO OFF
REM Install options
SET OPTIONS=
SET OPTIONS=CREATEDESKTOPLINK=0
SET OPTIONS=%OPTIONS% SELECT_WORD=0
SET OPTIONS=%OPTIONS% SELECT_EXCEL=0
SET OPTIONS=%OPTIONS% SELECT_POWERPOINT=0
SET OPTIONS=%OPTIONS% INSTALLLOCATION=Q:\OOo3.001
SET OPTIONS=%OPTIONS% COMPANYNAME="Company Name"
SET OPTIONS=%OPTIONS% USERNAME="Company User"
SET OPTIONS=%OPTIONS% ADDLOCAL=ALL
SET OPTIONS=%OPTIONS% REMOVE=gm_Oooimprovement,gm_o_Javafilter,gm_o_Onlineupdate,gm_o_jf_Palm,gm_o_jf_Pocketpc,gm_o_Quickstart,gm_o_Activexcontrol,gm_o_Winexplorerext
START /WAIT MSIEXEC /I openofficeorg32.msi ALLUSERS=TRUE REBOOT=SUPPRESS %OPTIONS% /QB-
